page.title: 14THE ARTS
page.content: {THE ARTS} In Pershore there is a{Library}with very interesting books and stories, like encyclopaedias, fiction stories and facts about famous people and countries, activities and nature. In the Library there is a room which is used as an art gallery. Some pictures are of Pershore and are painted by Pershore artists too. In the High Street there is a stage {School of Dancing. }There is no cinema but a{film society}meets each week as do a local{string orchestra.} Every year there is a{poetry speaking {competition}for young people of all ages. The{Pershore Festival}attracts famous artists and musicians from all over the world. Performances are held in the Abbey. A local{choral society thrives with over 150 members.
